amendatorysection.catchline: Issue between owner and encumbrancer; order; effect.
amendatorysection.para: The court may direct an issue to be made up between the encumbrancer and the owner, which shall be decisive of their respective rights.

annotation.para: Court may direct issues to be made up between encumbrancer and owner of share. Hartman v. Drake, 166 Neb. 87, 87 N.W.2d 895 (1958).
